StepSize.description: Smallest level increment.  Ignored when Screener = true and for the accelerated threshold exam.

TonePulseNumber.description: Total number of tones played for each pulse train

PollingOffset.description: Period beyond last pulse where subject response still accepted, in ms.  Enforced on the CHA: PollingOffset <= MinISI <= MaxISI

MinISI.description: Minimum value for inter-stimulus interval (ISI), in ms. Enforced on the CHA: PollingOffset <= MinISI <= MaxISI

MaxISI.description: Maximum value for inter-stimulus interval (ISI), in ms. Enforced on the CHA: PollingOffset <= MinISI <= MaxISI

Screener.description: If true, will use the screener version of Hughson-Westlake level exam

NumCorrectReq.description: Number of correct responses required to pass, and end the exam early (if applicable). Only used when Screener = true

SemiAutomaticMode.description: If true, pause after each pulse train to wait for a response.  If false, proceed in a fully automated fashion.
